aixm:PostalAddress.aixm:deliveryPoint: Gorna Oryahovitsa Airport Plc. 5100 Gorna Oryahovitsa Republic of Bulgaria

aixm:LinguisticNote.aixm:note: Remark:The operational hours of the AD are 0400-2000 (0300-1900). Outside these hours AD is available after PPR submitted to FAX: (+359 618) 60 021 or SITA:GOZAPXH, sent from Monday to Friday not lated than 8 hours before the end of the working time and after an approval granted by the AD administration.

aixm:PostalAddress.aixm:deliveryPoint: Gorna Oryahovitsa Airport Plc. 5100 Gorna Oryahovitsa Republic of Bulgaria

aixm:LinguisticNote.aixm:note: Remark:The operational hours of the airport services are 0500-2000 (0400-1900). Requests for services outside these hours should be submitted to the AD administration by e-mail:ops@gornaoryahovitsa-airport.bg, FAX: (+359 618) 60 021 or SITA:GOZAPXH as follows: - in the period from Monday to Friday at least 24 hours in advance but not later than 1500 (1400) UTC on the day before the flight. -for Saturday and Sunday the requests should be submited not later than 1500(1400) UTC on Friday. The AD administration coordinates the operation outside operational hours of all relevant services and sends a conformation or denial to the applicant. The AD administration may deny the request whenever the operation or services outside the operational hours cannot be assured.
Organisation in charge:CIVIL AIRPORT GORNA ORYAHOVITSA 2016 AD
Altimeter check location description:THR RWY 09 - ELEV 86m THR RWY 27 - ELEV 83m

Site Description:4km NE of Gorna Oryahovitsa
